alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 12:31PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Searcy and south central Marion Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Point Peter, or 11 miles northwest of Marshall, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall... Duff... Point Peter... Maumee... St. Joe... Gilbert... Zach... Morning Star... Silver Hill... Mull... Maumee Crossing... Snowball... Lone Pine... Woolum Recreation Area... Baker Ford... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations
